alert.note: Alert for Eastern King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western New Kent and southeastern King William Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Talleysville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... New Kent, King William, Talleysville, Providence Forge, Wrights Corner, Mountcastle, Cohoke, Rose Garden, Quinton, Colonial Downs, Lanesville, Browns Corner, Palls, Cooke and New Kent Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
